feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 09:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area late this morning and early this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog becoming fog patches overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 08:26 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:26 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
